languages.text: "Мое ложе вскоре займет другой ткач... Прискорбно. Я буду тосковать по беседам с моими неживыми сестрами и братьями".
"Another spinner will soon take my bed... That is regrettable. I will miss conversing with my sisters and brothers who have passed on."
languages.original_text: "Мое ложе вскоре займет другой ткач... Прискорбно. Я буду тосковать по беседам с моими неживыми сестрами и братьями".

traits.locale_text: "Another Weaver will have my bed soon... That is regrettable. I am going to miss conversing with my sisters and brothers who have passed on."
"Another Weaver will have my bed soon... That is regrettable. I am going to miss conversing with my sisters and brothers who have passed on."
"Another weaver will soon take my bed... That is regrettable. I will miss conversing with my sisters and brothers who have passed on."
"Another weaver will soon take my bed... That is regrettable. I will miss conversing with my sisters and brothers who have passed on."
"Another spinner will soon take my bed... That is regrettable. I will miss conversing with my sisters and brothers who have passed on."
"Another spinner will soon take my bed... That is regrettable. I will miss conversing with my sisters and brothers who have passed on."

languages.text: "Bald wird ein anderer Spinner mein Bett übernehmen ... Das ist bedauerlich. Ich werde es vermissen, mit meinen weitergegangenen Brüdern und Schwestern zu sprechen."
languages.original_text: "Another spinner will soon take my bed... That is regrettable. I will miss conversing with my sisters and brothers who have passed on."

traits.locale_text: "Bald wird ein anderer Spinner mein Bett übernehmen ... Das ist bedauerlich. Ich werde es vermissen, mit meinen weitergegangenen Brüdern und Schwestern zu sprechen."

languages.text: «Otro tejedor ocupará pronto mi cama... Es una lástima. Echaré de menos las conversaciones con mis hermanos y hermanas fallecidos».
languages.original_text: "Another spinner will soon take my bed... That is regrettable. I will miss conversing with my sisters and brothers who have passed on."

traits.locale_text: «Otro tejedor ocupará pronto mi cama... Es una lástima. Echaré de menos las conversaciones con mis hermanos y hermanas fallecidos».

languages.text: 「すぐに次の紡績工に寝床を取られることになるでしょう…それは残念なことです。他界した姉妹や兄弟たちと会話できなくなるのはさみしいことでしょうね」
languages.original_text: "Another spinner will soon take my bed... That is regrettable. I will miss conversing with my sisters and brothers who have passed on."

traits.locale_text: 「すぐに次の織り手に寝床を取られることになるでしょう…それは残念なことです。他界した姉妹や兄弟たちと会話できなくなるのはさみしいことでしょうね」

languages.text: “很快，另一位织网者就会躺在我的床上……真是令人遗憾。那些去世的兄弟姐妹们，我会怀念和他们之间的谈话。”
languages.original_text: "Another spinner will soon take my bed... That is regrettable. I will miss conversing with my sisters and brothers who have passed on."

traits.locale_text: “很快，另一位织网者就会躺在我的床上……真是令人遗憾。那些去世的兄弟姐妹们，我会怀念和他们之间的谈话。”

languages.text: « Un autre tisseur occupera bientôt ma couche... Dommage, les conversations avec mes défunts frères et sœurs me manqueront. »
languages.original_text: "Another spinner will soon take my bed... That is regrettable. I will miss conversing with my sisters and brothers who have passed on."

traits.locale_text: « Un autre tisseur occupera bientôt ma couche... Dommage, les conversations avec mes défunts frères et sœurs me manqueront. »

languages.text: "Yakında başka bir dokur, yatağıma el koyacak... Üzücü oldu. Nihayete eren kardeşlerimle sohbet etmeyi özleyeceğim."
languages.original_text: "Another spinner will soon take my bed... That is regrettable. I will miss conversing with my sisters and brothers who have passed on."
